title: Sarah Mehlman Articles | Similarweb
description: Read articles by Sarah Mehlman, MI Content Manager at Similarweb. If you’re interested in marketing strategies & online traffic trends - Click to learn more
content: HomeBlogSarah Mehlman Sr. Marketing Intelligence Specialist Sarah Mehlman Sarah is a Senior Content Marketing Manager at Similarweb. With 5+ years of experience in the field, she is passionate about tapping into the power of words to create memorable content that engages readers and drives business goals. Outside of work, she loves traveling, enjoying time with her family, baking, and binging whatever’s new on Netflix. Sarah earned her bachelor’s degree in psychology from Clark University. Originally from Boston, Sarah now resides in Israel. Show more Marketing Intelligence Privacy-First SEO: How to Navigate Search Algorithms in the Era of Data Protection SEO by Sarah Mehlman 7 Min.
